title: Commutation agreements (early treaty termination)
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, commutation payment, reserves released, treaty terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Agreement status (executed). Link to both parties' systems (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged commutation agreements. Domain binding verifies both parties. Final settlement of all obligations. Multi-million to billion dollar settlements. Permanent treaty closure. Prevents future claims disputes.
